QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: enable
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Show Drone ID settings page when enabled

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: sendOperatorID
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: When enabled, sends operator ID message

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: selfIDFree
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Optional plain text for operator to specify operations data (Free Text). Maximum 23 characters.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: selfIDEmergency
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Optional plain text for operator to specify operations data (Emergency Text). Maximum 23 characters.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: selfIDExtended
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Optional plain text for operator to specify operations data (Extended Text). Maximum 23 characters.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: sendSelfID
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: When enabled, sends self ID message

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: basicIDUaType
QGC.MetaData.Facts.enumStrings: Undefined,Airplane/FixedWing,Helicopter/Multirrotor, Gyroplane, VTOL, Ornithopter, Glider, Kite, Free Ballon, Captive Ballon, Airship, Parachute, Rocket, Tethered powered aircraft, Ground Obstacle, Other

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: sendBasicID
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: When enabled, sends basic ID message

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: region
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: The region of operation the mission will take place in

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: latitudeFixed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Fixed latitude to send on SYSTEM message

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: longitudeFixed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Fixed Longitude to send on SYSTEM message

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: altitudeFixed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Fixed Altitude to send on SYSTEM message

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: categoryEU
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Category of the UAS in the EU region

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: classEU
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Class of the UAS in the EU region
QGC.MetaData.Facts.enumStrings: Undeclared,Class 0, Class 1, Class 2, Class 3, Class 4, Class 5, Class 6
